item.description:
Hi Everyone,

It's getting warmer, but ski season isn't over yet. There's plenty of spring skiing still to be had up in the Mount Washington Valley. With great weather for spring skiing, this is always a popular weekend every year and we'll have a lot of club members up at the Brettl-Hupfers lodge.

Our lodge is located within 2 minutes of Attitash and 20 minutes of Bretton Woods and Wildcat. This is a great weekend to come ski with a great group of people and have some fun afterwards. Guests are welcome for $20 per night lodging at the club. Full details and information will be sent to all Yes RSVPs.

All members and guests must be 21+

Hope to see you up!
item.how_to_find_us: Come on into the lodge and say hello
item.name: Weekend at the Bretts March 27th to 29th
